metadata.name: HackTool - CrackMapExec Execution
metadata.comment: This rule detect common flag combinations used by CrackMapExec in order to detect its use even if the binary has been replaced.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\crackmapexec.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -m pe_inject ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --local-auth')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -x ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --local-auth')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -h \'nthash\'')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' mssql ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -m ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -d ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' smb ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -h ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -m ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -o ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' smb ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --local-auth')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --local-auth')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' 10.')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' 192.168.')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/24 '))))

output.summary: This rule detect common flag combinations used by CrackMapExec in order to detect its use even if the binary has been replaced.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: ComputerName, actor.user.name, process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown References: https://mpgn.gitbook.io/crackmapexec/smb-protocol/authentication/checking-credentials-local, https://www.mandiant.com/resources/telegram-malware-iranian-espionage, https://www.infosecmatter.com/crackmapexec-module-library/?cmem=mssql-mimikatz, https://www.infosecmatter.com/crackmapexec-module-library/?cmem=smb-pe_inject
